Welcome to Fantasy Draft’s documentation!¶

main Creates a fantasy football draft simulation

Author: Zach Sahlin

main.main()¶
Returns

none


class main.Draft(num_teams, pos_list=None)¶

A fantasy football draft

create_teams(num_teams)¶

Creates the teams in the draft

Parameters

num_teams – number of teams in the league

draft_player(team)¶

Drafts a player to a team

Parameters

team – the team the player will be drafted to

end()¶

Ends the draft and projects rankings

get_players(pos=None)¶

Gets the player list

Returns player_df

DataFrame of all the players

read_players(filename)¶

Reads in the player data from a csv file

Parameters

filename – name of the file with the player data

start()¶

Starts the draft

A fantasy football team

adds a player to the team

Parameters

player_rank – the rank of the player to add

the positions on the team that are empty
